\def\sig#1#2#3#4{\vbox{\hsize=5.5cm
    \kern2cm\hrule\kern1ex
    \hbox to \hsize{\strut\hfil #1 \hfil}
    \hbox to \hsize{\strut\hfil #2  \hfil}
   \hbox to \hsize{\strut\hfil #3 \hfil}
    \hbox to \hsize{\strut\hfil #4 \hfil}}}
